pullrequest.title: Added deprecation warning prints extending pull request #2622

content.raw:
From my point of view, I'd do it in 7-9. But that's probably more a decision for Gazebo maintainers.

The `gzwarn`s in Model.cc should be outside the foreach loop, shouldn't they? And also the text should tell that `Model::SetLinearAccel` is deprecated, and not `Link::SetLinearAccel`.
content.html:
From my point of view, I'd do it in 7-9. But that's probably more a decision for Gazebo maintainers.

The gzwarns in Model.cc should be outside the foreach loop, shouldn't they? And also the text should tell that Model::SetLinearAccel is deprecated, and not Link::SetLinearAccel.
